instructions: Fill in first your basic details and upload a photo. You'll be asked for your political opinions thereafter.

nominations.description: These are the constituencies where you're nominated along with the election list and possible election symbol. If a nomination is marked 'Pending', your election symbol might not yet be defined.
nominations.title: Nominations
